welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Alblasserdam, a charming Dutch town famous for its windmills and scenic canals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to discover all the beauty this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, handling freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights at Gilze-Rijen Airport.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo operations at Gilze-Rijen Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly European and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly intercontinental and non-Schengen flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly low-cost carriers and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly SkyTeam alliance airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
